mapper.select: select q.id, q.member_id, m.name, q.subject, q.content, q.readcount, q.date from qna_board q Join member m ON q.member_id = m.id order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select q.id, q.member_id, m.name, q.subject, q.content, q.readcount, q.date from qna_board q JOIN member m ON q.member_id = m.id where q.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update qna_board set readcount=readcount+1 where id=#{id}
update qna_board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
update qna_comment set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select q.id, m.name, q.subject, q.content, q.readcount, q.date from qna_board q JOIN member m ON q.member_id=m.id where q.subject like #{search} order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(id) from qna_board where subject like #{search}
